types.html:
rentrer dedans

  1. Used other than figuratively or idiomatically: see rentrer,‎ dedans.
  2. (intransitive) to physically attack, assault, beat up
  3. (intransitive) to verbally attack, to severely scold or criticize, to dress down
    Quand il a découvert mon erreur, il m'a rentré dedans comme il faut.
    When he discovered my mistake, he really tore into me.
trans: Used other than figuratively or idiomatically: see rentrer,‎ dedans.
to physically attack, assault, beat up
to verbally attack, to severely scold or criticize, to dress down
